scripts.build: bun run --cwd packages/core build && bun run --cwd packages/cli build
scripts.dev: bun run build && concurrently -n core,cli,example -c blue,green,magenta "bun run --cwd packages/core dev" "bun run --cwd packages/cli dev" "bun run --cwd examples/express-app dev"
scripts.clean: bun run --cwd packages/core clean && bun run --cwd packages/cli clean
scripts.typecheck: bun run --cwd packages/core typecheck && bun run --cwd packages/cli typecheck
